00025 #define EN0     0       /* MODE == encrypt */
00026 #define DE1     1       /* MODE == decrypt */
00027 
00028 extern void deskey(unsigned char *, int);
00029 /*                    hexkey[8]     MODE
00030  * Sets the internal key register according to the hexadecimal
00031  * key contained in the 8 bytes of hexkey, according to the DES,
00032  * for encryption or decryption according to MODE.
00033  */
00034 
00035 extern void usekey(unsigned long *);
00036 /*                  cookedkey[32]
00037  * Loads the internal key register with the data in cookedkey.
00038  */
00039 
00040 extern void cpkey(unsigned long *);
00041 /*                 cookedkey[32]
00042  * Copies the contents of the internal key register into the storage
00043  * located at &cookedkey[0].
00044  */
00045 
00046 extern void des(unsigned char *, unsigned char *);
00047 /*                  from[8]           to[8]
00048  * Encrypts/Decrypts (according to the key currently loaded in the
00049  * internal key register) one block of eight bytes at address 'from'
00050  * into the block at address 'to'.  They can be the same.
00051  */
00052
